trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Huntington
There were no other sightings in Huntington on or around March 8th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsMy boyfriend and I were out on the front porch of the house, he had called me to come see this thing in the sky. When I got out to the porch I looked up in the sky where he was pointing I was looking towards the eastern part of the sky and seen the shimmering silver football race through the sky, no noise, no trail, no wings I could make out and no lights as a plane would have. My boyfriend got a wonderful picture of the object an he has sent it in I believe.
